explanation: [0-0] An orange dog stands on a grassy field, with mountains and green hills in the background. The dog is holding a blue ball and grinning, as a giant hand reaches in from the right side of the frame with its fingers curved.

[0-5] The dog then tosses the ball in the air, the giant hand slowly extends, fingers curved. The orange dog throws the ball to the right, yellow light fills the screen, obscuring the dog and the giant hand. The frame freezes into a photograph that slowly zooms in, the giant hand imprinted with grey and red markings from the explosion.

[5-10] The scene then shifts to a yard, where a yellow chick wearing sunglasses stands on a grassy area in front of a house. The chick strikes a pose, raising its hands while holding eggs. The giant hand emerges once again from the right side of the frame with curved fingers. The chick begins juggling three eggs, with a bright smile on its face, enjoying the performance. As the giant hand slowly extends, the chick misses catching an egg, the frame freezes into a photograph and slowly zooms in. The photograph captures the chick's panicked expression as it's frozen in time, with the giant hand beside it making a half-heart gesture.

[10-16] The scene then transitions to a light green rabbit standing on a grassy field with mountains and green hills in the background. The rabbit has its eyes closed, smiling peacefully, jumping rope within the "C" shaped frame of the giant hand. The giant hand, once again, enters from the right side of the frame with curved fingers. The giant hand reaches towards the rabbit, and the delighted rabbit slings the jump rope, which forms a heart shape with the giant hand. This frame freezes into a photograph.

[16-25] The scene then shifts to a pink teddy bear standing in a room with yellow and pink walls and a red carpet on the floor. A giant hand enters from the right side of the frame, its fingers curved. The teddy bear widens its eyes and opens its mouth in surprise. The teddy bear then looks at the giant hand with its head tilted, pointing at its chin with its finger. Subsequently, the teddy bear hangs onto the giant hand. A silver, sparkling heart appears in the frame. The frame freezes at this moment and slowly zooms in.
